18 #ifndef GANDIVA_CONFIGURATION_H
19 #define GANDIVA_CONFIGURATION_H
20 
21 #include <memory>
22 #include <string>
23 
24 #include "gandiva/status.h"
25 
26 namespace gandiva {
27 
28 extern const char kByteCodeFilePath[];
29 extern const char kHelperLibFilePath[];
30 
31 class ConfigurationBuilder;
36 class Configuration {
37  public:
38  friend class ConfigurationBuilder;
39 
40  const std::string& byte_code_file_path() const { return byte_code_file_path_; }
41  const std::string& helper_lib_file_path() const { return helper_lib_file_path_; }
42 
43  std::size_t Hash() const;
44  bool operator==(const Configuration& other) const;
45  bool operator!=(const Configuration& other) const;
46 
47  private:
48  explicit Configuration(const std::string& byte_code_file_path,
49  const std::string& helper_lib_file_path)
50  : byte_code_file_path_(byte_code_file_path),
51  helper_lib_file_path_(helper_lib_file_path) {}
52 
53  const std::string byte_code_file_path_;
54  const std::string helper_lib_file_path_;
55 };
56 
61 class ConfigurationBuilder {
62  public:
63  ConfigurationBuilder()
64  : byte_code_file_path_(kByteCodeFilePath),
65  helper_lib_file_path_(kHelperLibFilePath) {}
66 
67  ConfigurationBuilder& set_byte_code_file_path(const std::string& byte_code_file_path) {
68  byte_code_file_path_ = byte_code_file_path;
69  return *this;
70  }
71 
72  ConfigurationBuilder& set_helper_lib_file_path(
73  const std::string& helper_lib_file_path) {
74  helper_lib_file_path_ = helper_lib_file_path;
75  return *this;
76  }
77 
78  std::shared_ptr<Configuration> build() {
79  std::shared_ptr<Configuration> configuration(
80  new Configuration(byte_code_file_path_, helper_lib_file_path_));
81  return configuration;
82  }
83 
84  static std::shared_ptr<Configuration> DefaultConfiguration() {
85  return default_configuration_;
86  }
87 
88  private:
89  std::string byte_code_file_path_;
90  std::string helper_lib_file_path_;
91 
92  static std::shared_ptr<Configuration> InitDefaultConfig() {
93  std::shared_ptr<Configuration> configuration(
94  new Configuration(kByteCodeFilePath, kHelperLibFilePath));
95  return configuration;
96  }
97 
98  static const std::shared_ptr<Configuration> default_configuration_;
99 };
100 
101 } // namespace gandiva
102 #endif // GANDIVA_CONFIGURATION_H
